text: John Atherton (c. 1557 – 1617), of Atherton Hall, Leigh, Lancashire, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Lancashire in 1586 and for Lancaster in 1589. ==References== Category:1557 births Category:1617 deaths Category:English MPs 1586–1587 Category:Members of the Parliament of England (pre-1707) for Lancashire Category:English MPs 1589
title: John Atherton (died 1617)
